typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string (title)
}
source(output(
		userId as integer,
		id as string,
		title as string,
		completed as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> JsonSrc
DerivedColumn2 call(mapColumn(
		title,
		lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	output(
		headers as [string,string],
		body as (completed as string, id as string, title as string, userId as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true) ~> ExternalCall1
ExternalCall1 derive(new_id = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
JsonSrc derive(lkp = "/title") ~> DerivedColumn2
